extension.description:
Ultimate Google AdSense Module By Internet Partner

Ultimate Google AdSense Module by Internet Partner is module that allows you to easily insert Google AdSense ads on your Joomla based website.
More then that, you can set it up to prevent click on your own Google AdSense advertisements with IP Block.

More information on internetpartner.info

field.name: publisherId
field.label: Publisher ID
field.description: Enter Publisher ID from AdSense Code. It is an alphanumerical string like ca-pub-xxxxxxxxxxxxxx.

field.name: name
field.label: Name of AdSense unit
field.description: Enter the name of AdSense unit

field.name: slot
field.label: Slot number
field.description: Enter the slot number from AdSense Code. It is a numerical string like 54656789.

field.name: adFormat
field.label: AdSense Size
field.description: Choose the ad format and size that you would like to display in bootom your page.

field.name: title
field.label: Add AdSense Title
field.description: Add AdSense Title above Google ad

field.name: moduleClassSfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module, this allows individual module styling.

field.name: adCSS
field.label: Div CSS codes
field.description: Input any CSS code here. Width and height are autoadjusted based on the ad format that you choose.

field.name: blockedIPs
field.label: Blocked IPs
field.description: Enter an IP number that you would like to block. Devide the addresses by comma.

field.name: altMessage
field.label: Message on blocked IP
field.description: Enter a message to show when blocked IPs try to load the page.
